articles.description: The 25th annual Essence festival has kicked off, as the event celebrates the empowerment among African American men and women.
articles.content:
KeKe Palmer appears during the 2022 Essence Festival, as she speaks at the Ernest N. Morial Convention Center on July 1, 2022 in New Orleans.
Getty Images for Essence

articles.author: Nellie Andreeva
articles.title: ‘The Muppets Mayhem’ Crew Involved In Accident During Filming Of Disney+ Series - Deadline
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: There was an accident on the set of Disney+’s upcoming comedy series Muppet Mayhem late Friday night when a crew truck crashed into a tree on the edge of a cliff near Griffith Observatory, sources tell Deadline. We hear noone was hurt but the time …
